name: SPACeD (Hellhound Studios)
description:
SPACED IS MY FIRST ANDROID AND 2ND GAME DEVELOPED WITH UNITY 5.6

IT IS A FUN ENDLESS RUNNER  KIND OF GAME WHERE YOUR GOAL IS TO GO AS FAR IN THE GALAXY AS POSSIBLE AND UPGRADE YOUR SHIP BY COLLECTING COINS AND MYSTERY BOXES.

MINIMUM ANDROID VERSION : 

6.0 MARSHMALLOW
